title: Introducing: Iris
content:
Photo credit

LA duo Iris, comprised of Michelle Malley (vocals & rhythm guitar) and Alex Moreno (lead guitar) certainly know how to tug on the heart strings. Having released a trio of tracks back in 2011, Iris are back with a bundle of new material. Poignantly simplistic numbers, Good Stuff, Sleep and Kissing The Habit aren’t breaking down musical barriers, but for what they are, they’re rather stunning. EP highlight, the grungy Kissing The Habit finds Malley’s vocals duelling exquisitely with the atmospheric guitar playing of Moreno. Check out all three of the tracks below, and keep up with the duo on Facebook.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
